translations: n.[脊椎] 水鹿；[脊椎] 黑鹿（东南亚产的一种大鹿）

sentences.sentence: One of the most widely distributed deer species in the world, sambars live in forests throughout Southeast Asia and are favorite prey of tigers, for which this park is known.
sentences.translation: 黑鹿是世界上分布最广泛的鹿类之一，遍布于东南亚的森林里。在这座以虎闻名的公园中，它常成为老虎的猎物。
